description: ANA Reservation C13J79 - Return journey from Tokyo to Austin via San Francisco. United Airlines Economy Value Plus class. Final day of the Japan adventure - sayonara! 🇯🇵✈️🇺🇸

activities.description: 🧳 Final packing and check out from accommodation - Double check passport, JR Pass, souvenirs!
🚇 Tokyo city center to Haneda Airport (HND) - Allow extra time for train delays
🛫 Arrive at Tokyo International (Haneda) Airport (HND) - Check-in and security (3+ hours early for international)
✅ Check-in, security, duty-free shopping, final Japanese meal at airport - Last chance for omiyage (souvenirs)!
🛫 Depart Tokyo International (Haneda) Airport (HND) - United NH7010 (operated by United Airlines)
✈️ Flight NH7010: HND→SFO (9hr 15min trans-Pacific) - Economy Value Plus - Sleep, reflect on amazing trip!
🛬 Arrive at San Francisco International Airport (SFO) - Wednesday Dec 11, 6:45 AM PST (same day due to time zone)
⏰ Layover at SFO (2 hours 25 minutes) - Immigration, customs, terminal change for domestic connection
🛫 Depart San Francisco International Airport (SFO) - United NH7332 (operated by United Airlines)
✈️ Flight NH7332: SFO→AUS (3hr 18min) - Economy Value Plus - Almost home!
🛬 Arrive at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (AUS) - Wednesday Dec 11, 2:28 PM CST - Welcome home! 🏠
🚗 Baggage claim, customs, and head home - Trip complete! Time to start planning the next Japan adventure! 😊

reservations.name: ANA Return Flights to Austin
reservations.description: Return flights Tokyo to Austin via San Francisco - NH7010 (HND→SFO) and NH7332 (SFO→AUS) operated by United Airlines in Economy Value Plus class

transportation: ANA Reservation C13J79: NH7010 (HND→SFO), NH7332 (SFO→AUS) - operated by United Airlines | [Manage Booking](https://aswbe.ana.co.jp/webapps/servicing/mybooking)
accommodation: Economy Value Plus seats on both flights
meals: In-flight meals on both segments - last taste of Japanese hospitality on NH7010
budget: Flight already paid - ANA/United codeshare booking
notes: ✅ Reservation: C13J79 | ✅ Passenger: Adam Henderson | ✅ Economy Value Plus class | ✅ Check baggage weight limits for souvenirs! | Set watch back to US time zones during layover. Download photos from trip during flights. Prepare for reverse jet lag. Don't forget to declare any food items at customs!
